com.github.westonpace.jayvee.util
Class ConstantSource<T>

java.lang.Object
  com.github.westonpace.jayvee.workflow.StandardWorker
      com.github.westonpace.jayvee.util.ConstantSource<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
Worker
public class ConstantSource<T>
extends StandardWorker

Spits out a given constant value over and over. It can be useful whenever you want to hardcode the input to some buffer. Since this source could spit out the constant value forever it operates in a @OnRequestOnly fashion.

Field Summary
 Sink<T> outputSink
          The buffer which will be outputting the constant value given to this source.
